title: SysDVR Overlay
author: Hartie95
description: Overlay to check and change the current mode of SysDVR.
details:
This is a simple Tesla overlay to check and change the current mode of SysDVR.

Setup

Setup the tesla menu and nx-ovlloader
Setup SysDVR
changelog:
1.0.9

This update just adds compatibility with the newest SysDVR version (5.5.5)

1.0.8

This update adds compatibility with the newest SysDVR version (5.5).
It also updates libtesla and libnx, so should also contain a fix for a crash that sometimes happens in docked mode.

1.0.7

This updates libtelsa for compability with 16.0.0

1.0.6

This update just adds compability with the newest SysDVR version (5.4)

1.0.5

This update just adds compability with the newest SysDVR version (5.3.1) and updates libtesla to the latest version

1.0.4

This update just adds compability with the newest SysDVR version (5.3.0) and updates libtesla to the latest version

1.0.3

This update just adds compability with the newest SysDVR version (5.2.0)

1.0.2

- Fixed a bug causing a full tesla hang when sysdvr is not running
- updated to the newest libtesla

1.0.1

This update just adds compability with the newest SysDVR version (5.1.0)
